I received this set of nails from Influenster to test out for free and I have to say they are really great. I'm not usually a huge fan of press on nails but they really are great. I love how all the nails have a number on the tab so you can easily find the match to it. There is a huge variety of sizes available in the pack so there should be something for pretty much everyone. Once I had all my sizes picked out application was just a breeze and only took a few minutes for all my nails. My only caution is to add plenty of glue but be careful of adding to much because it can flood your cuticle a little but will peel off once it dries.

I have used Kiss nails before and I always love the finished product. I can normally wear them for about a week, before I soak them off because my real nails are growing so fast. I used the short length, this time around and I had to file my real nails down just so they would fit. After that the finished product was amazing, shining, and looked natural. However the next day (after applying them) I had 2 fall off, and a third fell off while I was eating. The other nails stayed on for a couple of more days before I removed them. Kiss Nails I love you, I do, But I think I will stick to the natural short, or medium length in the future.
I received these for free from Influenster and Kiss however the following opinion is my own honest one. These nails were easy to apply and very durable. And look great on and don't look super fake.

These artificial nails are a girls dream! If you're on a budget and a time crunch, do yourself a favor and get these! They are very user friendly, my toddler can do it! They don't damage your original nail either, which is great! No more hours wasted in a salon waiting for someone to give you a manicure. You can do these in the comfort of your own home with the assurance your new Kiss nails will last up to a week with no chips! They are gorgeous and come in a variety of styles, but the Short Length French Pearl Tip is my favorite. It's a classic, and the short length is good for girls on the go! No worries about them getting caught on something and falling off. These are great! Much cheaper than other artificial nails and a ton cheaper than gel nails or acrylics at a salon!

I received these in my influenster vox box and tried them for the first time. It was my first time ever using press on nails and the process was fairly simple and easy to do. The length of my nails however were very long to the point where I couldnt function. I clipped them and the nails performed well - no cracking. I had to file the edges down to smooth them out but after that they looked really nice! My problem with them is that they did not last 7 days at all. On my third day my thumb nail fell off. These are fun to use if you want a quick manicured look for special occasions but if you use your hands a lot these won't work. All in all they're an okay product. I don't know if I would repurchase these on my own.

These are okay. I'm a very active single mom of two boys so pampering myself is not always worth it. I got these free from Influenster for testing purposes and to put my review out there. When I received my Spring Fling Vox box I was excited that i got a product that I could try out and give myself a little much needed pampering. I followed the application directions to the T and still managed to get glue all over my fingers and the tops of my nails. You could see the glue underneath on a few nails but I honestly think that was something I did wrong. Sizing was alright I could probably use the rest of the nails in the package even though it's not a perfect fit. They started popping off after about 2 days, which was fine by me. I'll probably purchase these again if I have a special occasion that i need to look like a lady instead of a mom of two boys. All and all, if you're into press ons and diy manicures these are worth it.

I'm not a fake nail wearer. So I was reluctant to try these form my influenster sting fling box box. But I decided to anyway. I would get these again if I was going to an event and didn't have time or money for a manicure.

i recieved a pack of these nails from Influenster via my Spring Fling Voxbox. I have bought them many times before and probably will continue to buy them. I think that this is one of the easiest kits to use as far as a french manicure you can do yourself goes. I received these complimentary from influenster for review purposes. I love them. I have a 2 year old and when I do decide to pamper myself and do my nails I need something fast. I liked these nails. They actually lasted 2 1/2 weeks for me, and were easy to use. I was complimentary given these nails by influenster for testing purposes.

I received the Kiss Everlasting French manicure set for free in my Influenster SpringVoxBox. I was so excited to test these out, and really impressed with the end result! Affordable, easy to apply, comfortable to wear, and no chips!

I have to admit that I was a little hesitant when I received a sample of these in my Influenster Vox Box. I've never been very good at applying fake nails before, but these were so simple. I especially love that you are able to file them down to an even shorter length.

I am attending a wedding this weekend and I don't have time to get my nails done and I remembered I had the Kiss Everlasting Real Short Length French Nails and they were perfect. They look very natural and were very easy to apply.

I received this product for testing purposes in my Influenster Spring Voxbox. I thing this is a good product for the value. It is very easy to put on you can do it yourself without any help. I received a box of Kiss Everlasting French Nails in Real Short length for testing purposes - being a person that doesn't normally buy nails as I'll just paint my own, these took a few minutes to get the hang of, but after one or two nail applications I had them down. The glue dries really fast and you don't have to worry about slippage or anything like that because of it. I did get some air spots under a few of my nails and I've had about three come off since I put them on three days ago, but I was just able to file the glue down and reapply them with more glue. It is really quite simple and I've received many complements on how natural the nails look as well as the length. There are 28 in a box and that is more than enough to get the perfect fit for your nails and I am fairly certain mine will last the full 10 days - if another falls off, I'll keep my glue handy and just reapply them! This is an easy to use and inexpensive way to get a high-class look without going to the salon!

I received a package of Everlasting French complimentary from Influenster that I tried out and they were literally my first ever pair of falsies. The feeling of them was slightly horrifying for the first day but I used to them really quickly. I've also never been a fan of a plain french so I jazzed them up throughout the week with a couple of manis and which I was able to wear for three days each, no top coat and not a single chip. They honestly held better than polish on my natural nails. But speaking of natural nails, I must move on to the only thing I disliked about these pretties: The aftermath. My nails gave always been relatively weak but removing my falsies left them insanely rigged, weak, and brittle even after 45 minutes of buffing/drowning in cuticle oil. I had one pop off and replaced it with regular super glue instead of the glue provided with the nails and that one nail turned out better than the rest, so I'll probably use regular glue if I ever decide to go the falsies route again. All in all they were good, though. 8.5/10

Great product for short term use. Takes practice to apply neatly but once find your best way to apply, goes on with ease and received lots of compliments. Will definitely reorder use again for both that special occasion when need a boost or just around the house to pamper yourself. Also great tool to break habit of biting nails!

I have received a box of Kiss Everlasting French Nails to review as a member of Influenster. I have officially had my nails on for a week, and I believe they are almost ready to come off. The nails were very easy to apply - tip: make sure you put glue near the edges on both your nail and the artificial nail - air bubbles will cause your nail to pop right off the next day. Also, careful not to get glue on the artificial nail - it messes up the topcoat and looks horrible. Once applied, I did normal chores like washing dishes, bathing kids, cooking, cleaning. I think the life of a few of nails were shortened by the hot water I use to clean and wash dishes. I noticed them starting to loosen after that. The box says wear over 7 days is not recommended, and it can be removed by acetone polish remover. I've taken a few off and can say, have a nail buffer and some hardening polish ready, because your nails will be weak afterwards! (which happens with every artificial nail application) Overall, it was a great fix-up for boring short nails - it made it look like I had a salon manicure

I received my french everlasting nails in my spring vox box complimentary thanks to Influenster. I was super excited to try these for my brothers graduation, because I wasnt really wanting to pay 50 for one at the salon. I was a little nervous, however, because usually, my experience with these kinds of products (i.e., fake eyelashes and any things that must be applied with glue) is not good. Surprisingly, however, the instructions were quite simple and the actual application was too. It was literally glue and stick em on. Not to mention, they looked fantastic and pretty similar to its salon counterpart. The only thing I didnt like about the nails was the fact that they were a little fragile. I had a few of them pop off when I hit them on something. But the ease of simply gluing the thing back on made up for any issues. I would definitely recommend Kiss Everlasting French Nails!

Normally I'm not one to wear glue on nails (I like painting instead) but I got to try these for free for testing purposes. I ended up liking them more than I initially thought! Here's my pros and cons: Pros: -The fit is amazing! They are so perfectly sized and shaped that I never had to trim any edges or anything. The only one I had a bit of a problem with was the thumb nail because it was too rounded for my cuticle. I just had to file a bit off. -The color of the nails look just as if I had had my nails done in the salon. -The length is just perfect. I like having long nails, but if they're too long they just cause problems. These are just the right length. They appear a bit long, but they are short enough to accomplish everyday tasks. Cons: -It seemed like I had to use far too much glue to get the nails to stick properly. I put a good sized dot in the middle and had to end up putting more on all around the nail. -If you look closely at the glued on nail, you can see some 'bubbles'. I thought it was because I wasn't using enough glue, but if I had put any more on, I'd have glue everywhere!!

I received this product complimentary for testing purposes. With that said, however, I would purchase these nails on my own if I had a special occasion to attend (wedding, New Year's Eve party, etc.) The pros: The nails were easy to apply and the glue dried quickly. I found that several of the nails sizes were fine to fit my nails and they were actually comfortable. Other fake nails I have used actually hurt when I wear them. I wore these for a few days without wanting to take them off. They also are realistic-looking. Several friends and family members asked if I had gotten a manicure at the salon. The cons: The nails claim to be chip-free for seven days, however towards the end of the first day of wear one of the white parts of the nail started peeling away and snagging on my clothes, towels, anything cloth that I touch. That was disappointing. The nails also did not wear as long as I hoped they would before the glue came undone. Overall: While I probably wouldn't wear these all the time, they are great for once-in-a-while. The price is right and for me they are more convenient than scheduling a manicure.

I work in a warehouse environment where we have to have nails less than 1/4 past your nail bed for safety reasons. I was very excited to try these out because I like to at least look feminine, even if I work with mostly men. As I mentioned, I already keep my nails short but I actually found that a few of these tips were too short for my nails and I either had natural nail hanging out at the tip or a crescent of nail bed exposed by the cuticle. I also found that the sizes of nails were not all a great fit for my nails. With that said, they are very easy to use and they do look nice once on. The quality is great, but beware that they are only intended to last 7 days (i actually like this feature), so they would be fantastic for a special occasion, prom, wedding, etc. ** I received this product complimentary for testing purposes from Influenster.

Kiss Everlasting French Nails. Artificial nails. I know, right That is exactly what I thought when I saw the package. I have never used fake nails in my adult life and when I dabbled in them as a pre-teen, they looked tacky and never lasted more than a day. But for the sake of experimenting, I decided to give these a chance. Let me tell you, DIY artificial nails have come a long, long way since I was 12 years old! Kiss Everlasting French Nails were easy to put on, just apply the glue and press them into place. I was sent the real short length which works well for my lifestyle of chasing a toddler. They stayed on for well over a week and stayed neat and clean looking. If I ever need to have fancy looking hands for a special occasion I will go the Kiss Everlasting French Nail route! Great value compared to having your nails done in a salon.

Kiss everlasting nails are my first go to whenever I either don't have time to go to get my nails done or if I am on a budget and still want the next best thing. Of course they do not last as long as an acrylic set but they still give me that girly, cute, clean cut feeling. My reason for knocking off one star is because the glue could be a little more adhesive. Sometimes the nails will snap off and I would not even notice until later but I suppose you get what you pay for. All around, I would recommend. Tips: Apply a generous amount of the nail glue when you apply the nails, and use the tool to wipe the excess before it dries. This will eliminate some possible bubbles and will make them stay on a while longer. Wait AT LEAST 30 minutes before you decide to pull up those skinny jeans or anything like that. It might even be better to have someone help you apply them it makes it quicker and easier if you have trouble with your less dominant hand. Oh, and I do find that adding a little extra touch with your own polishes compliments the nails nicely (small strokes, matte coat, whatever you like), but only if you feel confident enough to.

I love this product! It's awesome if you want a cute look for date night without a pricey trip to the nail salon. It's best used on a short term basis meaning it doesn't last as long as acrylic sets from the salon but if you are like me and only get your nails done for special occasions they are perfect! Put them on for your event and don't worry about the horrible nail damage that is inevitable after a salon acrylic set! Love it!

I'm not a big fan of real short nails but these are very nice and looks just like you got your nails done! They are easy to apply and stayed on for about 48 hours, but I'm a mom at home cooking and cleaning so that may be a reason they didn't last that long on me. I would recommend these to anyone, their great for a night out or an event. I got to review Kiss Everlasting French Manicure for free courtesy of Influenster.

I received this item courtesy of influenster for testing purposes. I just recently purchased a house so I had to cut the monthly nail salon visits out of my life for a while and I hate my real nails. When I received this I was excited to try it. I put them on with ease and actually fairly quick. I have had them on for over a week and I love them. They looks classy, real and they are durable! Wonderful product for 5!

I received these nails for free to sample in my springvoxbox to test. Being a tomboy, I didn't think I would like these and they would look bad, but my friends and I ended up being so impressed. I wore them for a wedding and they were perfect! I can't believe these are considered short. The length was a bit hard to adjust to! Now to figure out how to take my contacts off with them on my fingers!! Ouch

These overall are a good product. I was very skeptical about using fake nails assuming that they were hard to put on but i was wrong. I feel weird using them because they are my first time ever using fake nails. I Would suggest the next time using these to be careful with the glue and find the right size and just hold it. i was impatient and had to do it more than a few times.

If your trying to make a great 1 st impression for a date, job interview, business card photos, ect. Add a little pizazz to you fingernails! This is my 1 st time using kiss nails they took all of 5 minutes to put on and last! They look great and are short enough that they do not interfere with my daily activities! If you weren't sure about these I recommend you give them a try!

These nails were easy to apply and fit my nails well. They were also pretty comfortable. I would recommend them to anyone that wants a professional looking manicure on a budget, and one that is quick and easy! I usually paint my nails, but these are great for special occasions.They come with everything you need to apply them, and the glue isn't messy.

I recieved these nails from influenster for testing purposes.I usually do not wear fake nails,but I gave these a whirl.I am so glad I did they look so beautiful.With two sizes it is easy to find just the right length.The white tip has just a hint of a sparkle.The price is good,what else can I say!!!! I am going to start buying these nails.

Got an even to go to and no time to get a manicure Do not want to be seen with those chipped up nails Or do not have the money to get that salon nail look These are your answer. I got to try mine for free from influenster. I am very happy and will be buying some in the future. I got the really short ones. They look super nice for the price.

It had been many years since I had used glue on nails. What I first noticed was that the nails are tapered, they are thinner at the bottom. I thought this gave a much more natural look than the nails that I had used in the past. The tab made them easy to pick up and easy to apply. They looked great on and felt very secure. They didn't last as long as I had hoped, but I have always had an issue with artificial nails staying on. But I was very impressed with how these looked. Disclosure: I received this product free from Influenster for review purposes. All opinions are my own and honest.

I received these free for testing from Influenster.com This is not normally a product I would buy as I prefer to paint my own nails, but decided to give it a try based on how easy it seemed AND the real length. I found them easy to apply pretty much though I am sure there is a learning curve as I really was unsure how much glue was the proper amount. I liked the tabs, and the dry time was super fast. They do look really nice on, and I can continue my every day activities(like typing this review).. I can not comment yet on how long they will last as I am only on day 1

I'd like to begin this by saying I have a really bad nail biting habit. I can't seem to stop and I have tried. So, fake nails are a comfort for me because I can't just bite them off and make them look are jacked and sad like my real nails. For people with the same problem, I am really going to recommend this product because they are easy to put on and inexpensive at around 6.69. The product is Kiss Everlasting French Nails and I received it complimentary for testing purposes in my Spring Vox Box from Influentser. You start the process by removing all nail polish and oil from your nails. Then you go in with the manicure stick included and push back your cuticles. You are supposed to trim your nails as well, but since I chew mine down so much I was able to skip this step. Next, you pick out the sizes you are going to use for each finger. You can trim the sides a bit with the nail file if needed. Then you hold the nails by the tab and apply the glue. You also add a little glue to your natural nail. Then you apply the nail slowly and hold until it sticks. Wipe the excess glue. Then just bend the tab and twist to remove it. After that you just apply a top coat and you are all done. :) You have adorable little nails. A couple things I will say though. First, these nails aren't intended to last longer than 10 days. I'm sure they can, but they aren't made to. Also, mine ended up a bit crooked to really make sure you're getting them on straight.

i received these kiss everlasting real short french nails from influenster in my springvoxbox to try free and review. this was my first experience with a apply nail and i was a little worried but had nothing to fear, very quick and easy to apply with very pretty results. my nails look like i had went to the salon! i really liked how there are plenty of nail size choices included. i as well was happy that some excess glue got on my finger tip and was able to rub it off with a polish remover very easily!

I'm not a user of fake nails so when I got these French nails for testing purposes from Influenster I was worried that they would look cheep and worse hurt my nails. However the look was amazing I got compliments for them as if I had gotten them done at a salon. The problem was that they did not last long after one day my nails started coming off. Yet for the type of use I need them say for special events I would definitely use them. Save the cost of the salon and not worry about them looking store bought.

I received these complimentary from Influenster for testing purposes. I applied them on Sunday and they were surprisingly very pretty despite being my first time and getting the glue everywhere. On Wednesday I was tying one of my kids shoes and the thumb just popped right off. The box said they should last a week so I was a little bummed out but I am very hard on my hands so I didn't have high hopes. That being said, they're really pretty and I will definitely try them again!

I'm not usually a fake nails type of girl, but when I received these in my Spring Fling Vox Box from Influenster for testing purposes. I thought I should give them a try. Everyone has been asking me if they're real because they look so natural and look nice and like you got them done at the salon. Unfortunately, they don't stay on for longer than a few days. If you don't want to spend the money or time on salon nails, these are an option for a special occasion.

My opinion of the Kiss Everlasting French is they are a little long I put them on exactly how they were in the box for the first time to see how they were straight out of the box. I think they're little long and I personally would have trimmed them down so they were not so long. It is very hard to type and do other things especially with my kids with long nails when you are not used to them. Next day I did trim down. Like them better like this. Tip though check first so that you can trim from the top so you still have the nice french color more! Days later: I have popped them all off. They came off slowly one by one. I would say for a special occasion or night out these are great. More than 1-2 weeks is pushing it. Still they held up and didn't chip/break. I relieved these complimentary products for testing purposes from Influenster

These obviously can't compare to getting done in a salon but these look amazing and they're quick and easy to use. They could stay on a little better but overall they're great for a night or two. I thought the tabs on them would be annoying but they actually helped a lot. And once I ripped off the tab, I couldn't even tell it was there. I will be buying these again!

I was provided with these for free by Influenster to review here. Plenty of sizes to choose from, application is very straightforward. Glue dries fast, but is STRONG! Be sure to apply starting from the pinky finger so you don't immediately lose functionality of your thumb.

This was the first experience I've ever had with glue on nails before. I would have never tried them if I hadn't received these nails complimentary for testing from Influenster. I have to say I'm glad I did. They literally take about 5min or less to glue on and set, after you figure out what size you nails are so about 10 in all. They stay on fairly well I had one that lifted on the 6th day of wear but thats not to bad considering your only suppose to wear them for up to 7 days. The only downside was removal. Since I didn't have the removing solution for these nails and ended up using acetone as recommended on the box and they took forever to come off and I really soaked them. Thats the only reason gave it 4 out of 5 stars.

I received this product complimentary of Influenster for testing purposes. I haven't worn fake nails in a long time. These nails were still a little long for my liking, even though they were Short Length. I had a little trouble finding the correct sizes for all of my nails. It suggest cutting and filing the edges to make them fit better, but being inexperienced at this, I was a little hesitant to go to those lengths. So I made do with what I had. They were easy to apply with the little tabs to help you grab them. They stayed on well also, but I ended up pulling them off a few days later because I'm just not crazy about how glue on nails feel. But they looked very pretty on and seemed really sturdy.

To start, I am not a press on nail person. Still, this product is great for achieving a Fast French Manicure without having to pay salon prices. As for the final product, the nails looked great although a bit long. I ended up filing and shaping them to be slightly shorter. Overall, they were much easier compared to other no dry time techniques like Sally Hansen strips or other press-ons I have used in the past. Still, I did have some issues with longevity as I didn't do anything out of the ordinary to 'protect them'. One of the nails fell off within a day of normal use, so I would try to reserve using them for special occasions. (Received free for testing purposes from Influenster)

I received my Everlastingfrench Kiss Nails in my SpringVoxBox compliments of Influenster. I was hesitant about the real short length because I usually prefer longer nails but the length is perfect! They give instant classic look to your nails but still allow you to function without the feel of extra long nails. The application process was super simple, but be careful to not put too much glue on because if it squeeze from under the nails it gets a bit sticky on your other fingers. My only complaint is I have long nail beds and I had to improvise on how I put a few on to make it look like it fit on my nail. Overall I would recommend this product.

I was pleasantly surprised with these nails. They are realistic looking and the length is dead on. I am able to type and not make too many errors due to the nails. They feel comfortable and it only took 45 minutes to apply. This time included reading the application, selecting the nails (filing the ones that were too big) and applying them. Be aware that the nails were intended for only 7 day wear (its on the box in two different places and in the instructions).

I am a beginner when it comes to putting on nails. I like mine very short and neat. I received this pack complimentary through Influenster to review. These tips were the best length for someone like me. The package comes with a lot of tips, so you can ensure the best fit for each of your nails. The glue is a lot like super glue I learned and I did have quite a time taking the nail off. If you like your nails to stay put, then these are perfect. I had to use a lot of Cutex nail polish remover to get the nail and glue off.

These nails are obviously not salon quality, but they are the next best thing. If you have an event where you only need to wear the nails for a few hours, definitely purchase these. Applying the nails was actually easier than painting them. The box comes with a variety of sizes, marked by numbers on a plastic tab attached to the nail. The package also includes a nail file so they you can customize the length and even width of the nails yourself if you would like. It took me about 10 minutes total to figure out which nails to use and to glue them on. They immediately dried and then I had a fresh manicure with no hassle. In two days the nails started to pop off, which did not surprise me. At least these nails don't hurt when they come off, unlike real acrylics. Overall the nails looked really good at a glance and in pictures, but not so great up close. I probably would purchase these if I needed a quick and cheap manicure. *I received this product complimentary for testing purposes*

I received the new Kiss Everlasting Real Short Length French Tip nails from Influenster for free to test out and I actually prefer glue-on/press-on nails compared to getting my nails done because my nail beds are oily to begin with and no matter how much I prep or they prep before hand acrylics just never stay on. So, I use these types of nails. I was so happy when I received the short length because I prefer shorter nails. These have a flexibility about them that allow them to move yet stay on your nails great. They lasted on me for about 4 days, but only because I'm rough with my nails ie. washing dishes, cleaning, ect. I think that if I were to use the heavy duty super glue for nails these would have lasted a lot longer and I plan on picking up a second pair to test this out and see. I think they look realistic - people thought I had gotten my nails done, but I explained I had gotten these to test out and where id gotten them from. I'm overall really impressed!

I really enjoyed wearing these nails, they were the perfect length. i usually avoid wearing fake nails because they are too long but these are perfect and very comfortable. The application process took me about 10 mins and on the back of the package there was easy to read instructions. There are so many nails in this kit so if any of them fall off you have plenty of replacement nails. I really like how this kit came with every thing needed. Glue, nails, nail file, and cuticle stick. Makes doing your nails easy. Another plus is that they last 7 days with no chipping, salon nails for a affordable price. I did have one problem while applying the first 2 nails, i put a bit too much glue and you could see the glue under the nail. But overall for my fist time applying fake nails i did a great job, practice makes perfect. I really like how long these lasted i got to day 6 when one nail fell off and i did so much chores and cleaning so glad with the results.
These are wonderful..i gave it a 4.5 because my nail bed is very small and i had to adjust the nails to fit my nails neatly..i wore them for 2wks..they stayed put...

My biggest issue - which not everyone will have - is that my nail beds are incredibly flat. Normally when picking out false nails, I need to go with the ones that are specifically made for flat beds. Since these are quite rounded, they do pop off my nails more easily, just because there's not as much nail actually attached directly to my real nail. Still, I just carry a thing of glue in my purse and glue it right back on - no harm done! :) I'm loving these nails!

You can actually get more uses out of one box by cutting down the largest nails if they're too big for you.
